targets.expr:
topk(10,
  sum by (http_route, http_request_method, method_route) (
    label_join(max_over_time(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance", http_route!="", error_type!=""}[$__rate_interval]), "method_route", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")
  ))

defaults.noValue: No requests for the specified range

targets.expr:
(sum by (job, instance)
(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance", http_response_status_code!~"[4-5].."}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum by (job, instance)
(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
* 100

topk(15, sum by (http_route) (rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) /
sum by (http_route) (rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))

defaults.noValue: No requests for the specified range
No requests errors for the specified range

targets.expr:
sum by(url_scheme, http_request_method, http_route, http_response_status_code, error_type)
(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance="$instance", http_response_status_code!~"[1-3].."}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

defaults.noValue: No queries found for the specified range
No queries found for the specified range

targets.expr:
topk(50, sum by (Message, Exception_Detail_Message, level) (
    count_over_time(
        {job="$job", instance="$instance"}
        | json
        | level =~ "(ERROR|CRIT.*)"
        | label_format Exception_Detail_Message=`{{ regexReplaceAll "(.*transaction-id: )(\\S+)(,.*Authz isn.t in progress.*)" .Exception_Detail_Message "$1<hidden>$3" }}`
        | label_format Exception_Detail_Message=`{{ regexReplaceAll "(NOGROUP.*)(#)(\\d+)(.*)(:)(\\S+)(\\')(.*)" .Exception_Detail_Message "$1$2<hidden>$4$5<hidden>$7$8" }}`
        | label_format Exception_Detail_Message=`{{ regexReplaceAll "(.*)(  )(\\d+)( )(.*)" .Exception_Detail_Message "$1$2<hidden>$4$5" }}`
        [$__auto]
    )
))
